#Build libqq-pidgin by emerge

= Introduction =
  This is a guide to update qq protocol of pidgin in gentoo

  There is two ways that you can do this.
  
= Overlay =   

[http://libqq-pidgin.googlecode.com/svn/portage/]

== Add libqq-pidgin's overlay==

{{{
svn co http://libqq-pidgin.googlecode.com/svn/portage/ /var/lib/libqq-pidgin
vim /etc/make.conf
}}}

append
{{{
PORTDIR_OVERLAY="
$PORTDIR_OVERLAY
/var/lib/libqq-pidgin
"
}}}


= 1st way =

== ` USE="-qq" emerge pidgin-qq2010 -av ` ==

------

= 2nd way, full pidgin rebuild, see here =

Execute
{{{
USE=qq emerge pidgin-2.7.10-r??
}}} 

?? is the desired SVN revison number. Say, 83 , 

{{{
USE=qq emerge pidgin-2.7.10-r83 `
}}}

This will cause libqq-pidgin @ r83 version replace pidgin's qq, then do a full rebuild of pidgin.

Enjoin you self ;)
